name: Sisyphean
description:
*Warning* Game contains depiction of loss and struggle.

If you could stop the flowing of water, and wind, would you do so?

Grandma is dying, and the only way to help her is to endlessly power the hospital's electric system manually using a makeshift generator I created.

Controls

  • Space / Enter: Generate Power
  • Click on cable: Rotate Clockwise
  • R: Restart ( Or should you?)

Known Bugs

None thus far
